rooms.description: Spacious entry with reception area and small waiting lounge.
Open-plan Mediterranean style living room featuring large windows for ample natural light. Vastu aligned to the south-west for positive energy.
Adjacent dining space integrated into the living area. Aligned per Mediterranean aesthetics and functional layout.
Spacious bedroom featuring a private balcony. Positioned in accordance with Vastu for peaceful sleep; north-east facing recommended.
Well-lit secondary bedroom designed with Mediterranean touches and a focus on relaxation.
Additional bedroom ensuring balanced energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Multipurpose space serving as guest room or study area. Ensures balance in circulation as per local design norms.
Fully equipped Mediterranean kitchen with ample storage and functional layout. Aligned to the east for energy efficiency.
Dedicated space for utilities, laundry, and maintenance; designed for ease of access from the kitchen.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed to welcome visitors with an inviting design.
A series of windows across rooms for natural light and ventilation in compliance with Mediterranean aesthetics and Vastu principles.
Two-car garage door facilitating smooth entry of vehicles into the apartment. Designed to meet local building norms.

rooms.description: Open terrace designed for relaxation and garden space; integrates Mediterranean landscaping with Vastu considerations.
Bathroom facility providing additional comfort to guests. Layout optimized for privacy and ease of maintenance.
Small alcove spaces for guest storage or seating areas.

openings.description: Staircase designed for efficient movement between floors with safety features.

rooms.description: Flexible space for work or leisure activities; adaptable to bachelor pad needs and Mediterranean style.
Secondary living area providing additional space for relaxation or entertainment.

openings.description: Compliant with local building codes and safety regulations, providing an additional exit route.

rooms.description: Additional storage or creative space integrated into the attic for enhanced functionality.
